name: Alfred's Adventure
description:
Play as Alfred and take on waves of evil monsters attacking the land!............ Ok yea I didn't put much thought into the story

This is my submission for ScoreSpace Jam #8! Happy with how this one turned out. Especially since I ran into quite a few roadblocks during development. The theme for this jam is "Balance" and while I think the interpretation of the theme in this game is pretty loose, I really like the final product.

Give me all your honest feedback in the comments please! I'd love to hear your constructive criticisms.
